title: How to unsubscribe from MasterClass
description: MasterClass subscriptions are billed annually. To cancel your MasterClass subscription, you need to do so through their website. You cannot cancel via the mobile app. If you subscribed through a third party like the iOS App Store, Google Play, or Verizon +play, you'll need to cancel directly through them.

web.title: Cancel MasterClass Membership via Website
web.description:
To cancel your MasterClass membership via the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to www.masterclass.com and log in to your account.
*   Click on your profile icon or initials in the top right corner.
*   Select "Settings" from the drop-down menu.
*   In "Account Settings", find the "Membership" section and click "Cancel Membership".
*   Select "Cancel Now" to confirm and complete your cancellation.
*   Check your email for a cancellation confirmation.

seo_text: Cancel MasterClass subscription. Steps to cancel MasterClass. How to stop MasterClass subscription. MasterClass cancellation instructions. Unsubscribe from MasterClass.
